properties.name: beginGroup
properties.description: Specifies whether a group separator is displayed over the item.

properties.name: closeMenuOnClick
properties.description: Specifies if a menu is closed when a user clicks the item. Does not apply to the root items.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the menu item responds to user interaction.

properties.name: selectable
properties.description: Specifies whether or not a user can select a menu item.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Specifies whether or not the item is selected.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Specifies the text inserted into the item element.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies whether or not the menu item is visible.
